Hi Ogata,


This tutorial was made in the early days of the 3-phase method.  There have
been many bug fixes, including one where angles were mis-interpreted twice,
so the result for symmetric CFS was okay.


1 - Fixing the bug mentioned above affects the numbering of the view matrix
renderings.  So your figure 13 is correct.


2 - in figure 18, the venetian0 and venetian 45 labeling is swapped.  The
result isn't affected.


3 - this is strange, especially with part of the window showing up black.


Did you make sure to change to the W6 Standard basis in window (Figure 14
in the tutorial)?




I'm working on updating the tutorial to fix these issues and to incorporate
newer capabilities.  Hopefully I have a new version this week.


Andy
